comments.content:
Looks very close (especially the cap K) to [ITC Cheltenham Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20051225050109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-cheltenham/ultra/win-t1/166382/) but slightly fattened… must be all that MILK!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=CheltUltra.png)

Motter Corpus.  
Tankard’s Shire types.

hhp

20/15 baby. :-)  
Was the original post supposed to have an image? Because the only image I see is Norbert’s. So I assumed the request was for fonts that allude to milk. Sorry!

hhp

<cite>Looks very close (especially the cap K) to ITC Cheltenham Ultra but slightly fattened… must be all that MILK!</cite>

…and for the ‘wake up late, rush out the door’ types…you’ve got ITC Cheltenham Ultra Italic for On–The–Go quick one serving containers!
